info.name: Red Facebook - DistortedOutsider
info.description: A friend requested a theme with red replacing most of the blue. The left column is revealed on mouseover. Includes joshur8a's Facebook chat messenger.
info.additionalInfo:
I'm trying to fix a few bugs and improve compatibility with Firefox. I don't use Facebbok much so if you see something that needs to be fixed feel free to message me and I'll work on it ASAP.
Facebook Chat messenger (josher8a) / CC BY-SA 3.0
